text: Alberto Canapino (23 May 1963 - 15 February 2021)Datos fiscales de Alberto Canapino was an Argentine racing car engineer. He was born in Arrecifes, Argentina. He was also known for managing his son's, Agust√≠n Canapino races. Canapino was known for being part of Turismo Carretera races. On 3 February 2021, Canapino was hospitalized in Buenos Aires with COVID-19. He died on 15 February 2021 from the infection, aged 57. ==References== ==Other websites== * Trajectory of Alberto Canapino * Personal file of Alberto Canpino Category:1963 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Buenos Aires Category:Argentine racecar drivers
